translations: n.双头螺柱；图钉（stud 的复数形式）
v.用饰钉装饰；密布于（stud 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 柱焊，嵌柱焊接；螺柱焊接；电栓焊

sentences.sentence: You see studs on lots of front doors.
sentences.translation: 你能在许多前门上看到金属饰钉。

sentences.sentence: With coral clasps and amber studs.
sentences.translation: 配上珊瑚钩扣，把琥珀镶嵌。

sentences.sentence: I was just able to fit my drill and 6-inch bit between the studs.
sentences.translation: 使用电钻时板墙筋之间的空隙刚刚能容下6英寸的钻头。
